line.comment: * Preliminary checks.
* Let's make sure this signal is not spammed. ***trying 100x higher delay in SWM3
* Mayhem 3.9: reevaluating our current target is done through other scripts, and can potentially be bad for performance, and not very useful for gameplay.
* if [THIS]-> is script '!fight.attack.object' on stack of task=0
* $target.exists = $target-> exists
* $target.isShip = $target-> is of class [Moveable Ship]
* $target.distance = get distance between [THIS] and $target
* do if $target.exists AND $target.isShip AND $target.distance < 8000
* return null
* end
* $previousAttacker = [THIS]-> get local variable: name='mayhem_previousAttacker'
* if $previousAttacker == $attacker
* do if [THIS]-> is script '!fight.attack.object' on stack of task=0
* return null
* end
* [THIS]-> set local variable: name='mayhem_previousAttacker' value=$attacker
* 3.8, if we are attacked, we shouldn't give a damn about whether or not the attacker is friendly, right?
* skip if [NULL]-> call script 'Mayhem.IsHostileTo' : raceOrObject1=[THIS] raceOrObject2=$attacker
* return null
* Make sure both are enemies.
* Break the truce with player if any.
* Player carriers. If they have idle ships onboard, we make them support ships. Same code in !fight.attack.object.
* Check if we have an escort squadron and order the leader to attack (followers "attack same" so we don't need to manage them here).
* Consider attacking back only if we have lasers. Otherwise we flee to the nearest friendly station.
* Check if we have enough missiles.
* Ignore current target if it's in another sector.
* Huge ships don't waste their time on small ships if they already have a target, except if OOS.
* Fighters shouldn't try to hit huge ships if they haven't receive a direct order to do it, except if they're doing nothing.
* Counterattack if we are attacking a station.
* also check if we are a squadron follower and order our leader if he is still attacking the station to also counterattack our attacker.
* Always attack the attacker if we're targetting a freighter, except if it's another freighter.
* We shouldn't change target if it's not worth it.
* If we are small, prioritize other small targets.
* No combat ability.

sval.val: Asynchron signal. attacked
the attacker
Preliminary checks.
Let's make sure this signal is not spammed. ***trying 100x higher delay in SWM3
Mayhem 3.9: reevaluating our current target is done through other scripts, and can potentially be bad for performance, and not very useful for gameplay.
if [THIS]-> is script '!fight.attack.object' on stack of task=0
$target.exists = $target-> exists
$target.isShip = $target-> is of class [Moveable Ship]
$target.distance = get distance between [THIS] and $target
do if $target.exists AND $target.isShip AND $target.distance < 8000
return null
$previousAttacker = [THIS]-> get local variable: name='mayhem_previousAttacker'
if $previousAttacker == $attacker
do if [THIS]-> is script '!fight.attack.object' on stack of task=0
return null
[THIS]-> set local variable: name='mayhem_previousAttacker' value=$attacker
3.8, if we are attacked, we shouldn't give a damn about whether or not the attacker is friendly, right?
skip if [NULL]-> call script 'Mayhem.IsHostileTo' : raceOrObject1=[THIS] raceOrObject2=$attacker
return null
Make sure both are enemies.
Break the truce with player if any.
Player carriers. If they have idle ships onboard, we make them support ships. Same code in !fight.attack.object.
Check if we have an escort squadron and order the leader to attack (followers "attack same" so we don't need to manage them here).
Consider attacking back only if we have lasers. Otherwise we flee to the nearest friendly station.
Check if we have enough missiles.
Ignore current target if it's in another sector.
Huge ships don't waste their time on small ships if they already have a target, except if OOS.
Fighters shouldn't try to hit huge ships if they haven't receive a direct order to do it, except if they're doing nothing.
Counterattack if we are attacking a station.
also check if we are a squadron follower and order our leader if he is still attacking the station to also counterattack our attacker.
Always attack the attacker if we're targetting a freighter, except if it's another freighter.
We shouldn't change target if it's not worth it.
If we are small, prioritize other small targets.
No combat ability.
